name: STRAIGHT Virgin brazilian 100% remy human hair(100g per bundle)
description:
Straight hair, machine weft ,12''-28"
Colors: 1#, 1b#, 2#, 4#
Style: silky straight
Quality: no shedding, no tangles, top quality
****Hair last for up to 2 years if treated properly
Machine Weft: yes
***NOTE (HALF BUNDLES ARE HALF PRICE)
***NOTE (THE LONGER THE HAIR THE SMALLER THE BUNDLE

*****You will pay $100 per bundle for 12" in the store !!

1. Carefully detangle hair from the roots to the ends
2. Wash with mild shampoo in lukewarm water,avoiding rubbing and twisting of hair
3. After shampooing squeeze out excess water and pat dry with a towel
4. Add conditioner to the hair and gently comb through and leave on for five minutes
5. Rinse under lukewarm water squeeze out all excess water and pat dry with a towel
6. Washing liquid must be the acidity
7. Blow Dry hair and style as instructed by your stylist
8. Do not blow the root of hairs too near to the hair drier.
